content:
Has someone seen a similar msg? 

[#|2024-03-20T09:39:13.241+0000|SEVERE|Payara 6.2023.8||_ThreadID=25;_ThreadName=RunLevelControllerThread-1710927516211;_TimeMillis=1710927553241;_LevelValue=1000;|
  ERROR StatusLogger Log4j2 could not find a logging implementation. Please add log4j-core to the classpath. Using SimpleLogger to log to the console...|#]
When you're in containers that's nothing to worry about, standard out is catched anyway
Jup, I'm running containers and all the logs are available. Yet, it sound like the Log4j2 is not properly bootstrapped..
It's definitely been confusing for people to see that error.
